cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Meetings? üöÄ
cta.description: Join teams who've already eliminated meeting chaos. Try Neetings now - no installation required!

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Neetings

hero.title: üöÄ Streamline Your Meeting Notes
hero.description: Stop hunting through scattered notes. Neetings transforms your meetings into productive workflows with intelligent organization - all running 100% in your browser.
hero.termsAgreement: By using this service, you agree to our

confluence.question: üîó Does Neetings work with Confluence‚Ñ¢?
confluence.answer: Absolutely! üìã Download your meeting as Markdown, copy the content to your clipboard, and paste it directly into Confluence‚Ñ¢. ‚ú® Your structured blocks, formatting, and organization transfer seamlessly! üöÄ

whyChoose.question: Why choose Neetings over traditional note-taking apps?
whyChoose.answer: Stop fighting with generic text boxes! Neetings provides 11 specialized block types (Stories, TODOs, Decisions, Issues, etc.) that understand your meeting content. Plus, instant Kanban view, smart attendee tracking, and powerful filtering - all running 100% in your browser with zero setup.

security.question: Is my meeting data secure and private?
security.answer: Yes, your data never leaves your device. Neetings stores everything in your browser's localStorage - no backend servers, no data collection, no cloud sync. You maintain complete control and can export your data anytime as JSON files.

quickStart.question: How quickly can I get started?
quickStart.answer: Literally 30 seconds! Try our live demo instantly with no installation, or run locally with just 'npm install && npm run dev'. Create your first meeting, add some blocks, and experience the difference immediately.

blockSystem.question: What makes the block system so powerful?
blockSystem.answer: Each content type gets its own intelligent structure: TODOs have completion tracking, Q&As have separate question/answer fields, Research blocks track topics and results. No more forcing everything into plain text - your content gets the structure it deserves.

organization.question: Can I organize complex meetings effectively?
organization.answer: Yes! Switch to Kanban view to organize blocks into topic columns. Drag and drop between topics as discussions evolve. Use advanced filtering to find specific content types, completion status, or date ranges. Perfect for multi-topic meetings and sprint planning.

attendees.question: How does attendee management work?
attendees.answer: Smart autocomplete by name or email, global attendee registry across all meetings, visual participation tracking, and one-click assignment. See who attends which meetings and track engagement patterns over time.

teamSize.question: Is Neetings suitable for my team size and use case?
teamSize.answer: Neetings works well for various team sizes and use cases: team leads managing projects, product managers tracking decisions, consultants organizing client meetings, agile teams running sprints, or anyone managing meeting notes. Suitable for individual users to large organizations.

dataPortability.question: What about data portability and backups?
dataPortability.answer: Export all your meetings as JSON files anytime. Import/export for easy backups, cross-device sync via file transfer, and zero vendor lock-in. You maintain complete control over your data.

euDispute.title: EU Dispute Resolution
euDispute.text: The European Commission provides a platform for online dispute resolution (ODR):
euDispute.emailNote: Our email address can be found above.

consumerDispute.title: Consumer Dispute Resolution/Universal Arbitration
consumerDispute.text: We are not willing or obligated to participate in dispute resolution procedures before a consumer arbitration board.

featureFlag.notProductionReady: * Not production ready (yet) - please provide feedback via GitHub!

dataProcessing.title: Data Processing
dataProcessing.content: This application processes all data locally in your browser. No personal information, meeting notes, or any other data is transmitted to external servers or third parties.

localStorage.title: Local Storage
localStorage.content: All meeting data is stored exclusively in your browser's local storage. This data remains on your device and is not accessible to anyone else unless you explicitly export and share it.

noCookies.title: No Cookies Policy
noCookies.content: This application does not use cookies, tracking pixels, analytics services, or any other tracking technologies. Your privacy is completely protected.

privacy.title: Privacy Guarantee
privacy.content: We guarantee complete privacy: no data collection, no user tracking, no analytics, no external API calls for core functionality. Your meeting notes and personal information stay private and secure.

serviceAvailability.title: Service Availability
serviceAvailability.content: This service is provided free of charge with no guarantees of availability, uptime, or continuity. We reserve the right to discontinue, modify, or suspend the service at any time without prior notice. Users have no right to demand continued service or updates.

noSupport.title: No Support Obligation
noSupport.content: We provide this service without any obligation to offer technical support, bug fixes, updates, or improvements. Any updates or improvements are provided at our sole discretion and users have no right to demand such services.

asIs.title: "As-Is" Service
asIs.content: This application is provided "as is" and "as available" without warranties of any kind, either express or implied. We do not warrant that the service will be uninterrupted, error-free, or meet your specific requirements.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: In no event shall we be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from your use of this service. Users assume all risks associated with using this application and are solely responsible for backing up their data.

userResponsibility.title: User Responsibility
userResponsibility.content: Users are solely responsible for their data and must regularly export and backup their meeting notes. We are not responsible for any data loss, regardless of cause.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting. Continued use of the service constitutes acceptance of any modifications.

import.corrupted_data: The file appears to be corrupted or incomplete
import.corrupted_data_action: Try re-exporting the data from the original source
import.version_mismatch: This file was exported from an incompatible version
import.version_mismatch_action: Update your app or use a compatible export format
import.version_can_migrate: This file is from an older version but can be updated
import.version_can_migrate_action: Click "Import Anyway" to automatically update the format
import.missing_required_fields: The file is missing essential information
import.missing_required_fields_action: Check the original export or contact support
import.invalid_meeting_data_action: Review the meeting data and try importing again
import.invalid_attendee_data_action: Check attendee names and email addresses
import.invalid_block_data: Some meeting content blocks are invalid
import.invalid_block_data_action: Review the meeting content and try again
import.orphaned_attendees_action: Import will continue but some attendees may be missing

import.security_validation_failed_action: Ensure the file is from a trusted source

export.format_error: The selected export format is not available

general.memory_error: The operation requires too much memory

general.network_error: Unable to complete the operation due to network issues

import.partial_success_action: Review the imported data and fix any issues
import.complete: Your data has been imported successfully

export.complete_action: The file has been downloaded to your device
